AddInstanceFleet.name: AddInstanceFleet
AddInstanceFleet.description: Grants permission to add an instance fleet to a running cluster

AddInstanceGroups.name: AddInstanceGroups
AddInstanceGroups.description: Grants permission to add instance groups to a running cluster

AddJobFlowSteps.name: AddJobFlowSteps
AddJobFlowSteps.description: Grants permission to add new steps to a running cluster

AddTags.name: AddTags
AddTags.description: Grants permission to add tags to an Amazon EMR resource

AttachEditor.name: AttachEditor
AttachEditor.description: Grants permission to attach an EMR notebook to a compute engine

CancelSteps.name: CancelSteps
CancelSteps.description: Grants permission to cancel a pending step or steps in a running cluster

CreateEditor.name: CreateEditor
CreateEditor.description: Grants permission to create an EMR notebook

CreatePersistentAppUI.name: CreatePersistentAppUI
CreatePersistentAppUI.description: Grants permission to create a persistent application history server

CreateRepository.name: CreateRepository
CreateRepository.description: Grants permission to create an EMR notebook repository

CreateSecurityConfiguration.name: CreateSecurityConfiguration
CreateSecurityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a security configuration

CreateStudio.name: CreateStudio
CreateStudio.description: Grants permission to create an EMR Studio

CreateStudioPresignedUrl.name: CreateStudioPresignedUrl
CreateStudioPresignedUrl.description: Grants permission to launch an EMR Studio using IAM authentication mode

CreateStudioSessionMapping.name: CreateStudioSessionMapping
CreateStudioSessionMapping.description: Grants permission to create an EMR Studio session mapping

DeleteEditor.name: DeleteEditor
DeleteEditor.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR notebook

DeleteRepository.name: DeleteRepository
DeleteRepository.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR notebook repository

DeleteSecurityConfiguration.name: DeleteSecurityConfiguration
DeleteSecurityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a security configuration

DeleteStudio.name: DeleteStudio
DeleteStudio.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR Studio

DeleteStudioSessionMapping.name: DeleteStudioSessionMapping
DeleteStudioSessionMapping.description: Grants permission to delete an EMR Studio session mapping

DeleteWorkspaceAccess.name: DeleteWorkspaceAccess
DeleteWorkspaceAccess.description: Grants permission to block an identity from opening a collaborative workspace

DescribeCluster.name: DescribeCluster
DescribeCluster.description: Grants permission to get details about a cluster, including status, hardware and software configuration, VPC settings, and so on

DescribeEditor.name: DescribeEditor
DescribeEditor.description: Grants permission to view information about a notebook, including status, user, role, tags, location, and more

DescribeJobFlows.name: DescribeJobFlows
DescribeJobFlows.description: Grants permission to describe details of clusters (job flows). This API is deprecated and will eventually be removed. We recommend you use ListClusters, DescribeCluster, ListSteps, ListInstanceGroups and ListBootstrapActions instead

DescribeNotebookExecution.name: DescribeNotebookExecution
DescribeNotebookExecution.description: Grants permission to view information about a notebook execution

DescribePersistentAppUI.name: DescribePersistentAppUI
DescribePersistentAppUI.description: Grants permission to describe a persistent application history server

DescribeReleaseLabel.name: DescribeReleaseLabel
DescribeReleaseLabel.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR release, such as which applications are supported

DescribeRepository.name: DescribeRepository
DescribeRepository.description: Grants permission to describe an EMR notebook repository

DescribeSecurityConfiguration.name: DescribeSecurityConfiguration
DescribeSecurityConfiguration.description: Grants permission to get details of a security configuration

DescribeStep.name: DescribeStep
DescribeStep.description: Grants permission to get details about a cluster step

DescribeStudio.name: DescribeStudio
DescribeStudio.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR Studio

DetachEditor.name: DetachEditor
DetachEditor.description: Grants permission to detach an EMR notebook from a compute engine

GetAutoTerminationPolicy.name: GetAutoTerminationPolicy
GetAutoTerminationPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

GetBlockPublicAccessConfiguration.name: GetBlockPublicAccessConfiguration
GetBlockPublicAccessConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve the EMR block public access configuration for the AWS account in the Region

GetClusterSessionCredentials.name: GetClusterSessionCredentials
GetClusterSessionCredentials.description: Grants permission to retrieve HTTP basic credentials associated with a given execution IAM Role for a fine-grained access control enabled EMR Cluster

GetManagedScalingPolicy.name: GetManagedScalingPolicy
GetManagedScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to retrieve the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL.name: GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL
GetOnClusterAppUIPresignedURL.description: Grants permission to get a presigned URL for an application history server running on the cluster

GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL.name: GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL
GetPersistentAppUIPresignedURL.description: Grants permission to get a presigned URL for a persistent application history server

GetStudioSessionMapping.name: GetStudioSessionMapping
GetStudioSessionMapping.description: Grants permission to view information about an EMR Studio session mapping

LinkRepository.name: LinkRepository
LinkRepository.description: Grants permission to link an EMR notebook repository to EMR notebooks

ListBootstrapActions.name: ListBootstrapActions
ListBootstrapActions.description: Grants permission to get details about the bootstrap actions associated with a cluster

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description: Grants permission to get the status of accessible clusters

ListEditors.name: ListEditors
ListEditors.description: Grants permission to list summary information for accessible EMR notebooks

ListInstanceFleets.name: ListInstanceFleets
ListInstanceFleets.description: Grants permission to get details of instance fleets in a cluster

ListInstanceGroups.name: ListInstanceGroups
ListInstanceGroups.description: Grants permission to get details of instance groups in a cluster

ListInstances.name: ListInstances
ListInstances.description: Grants permission to get details about the Amazon EC2 instances in a cluster

ListNotebookExecutions.name: ListNotebookExecutions
ListNotebookExecutions.description: Grants permission to list summary information for notebook executions

ListReleaseLabels.name: ListReleaseLabels
ListReleaseLabels.description: Grants permission to list and filter the available EMR releases in the current region

ListRepositories.name: ListRepositories
ListRepositories.description: Grants permission to list existing EMR notebook repositories

ListSecurityConfigurations.name: ListSecurityConfigurations
ListSecurityConfigurations.description: Grants permission to list available security configurations in this account by name, along with creation dates and times

ListSteps.name: ListSteps
ListSteps.description: Grants permission to list steps associated with a cluster

ListStudioSessionMappings.name: ListStudioSessionMappings
ListStudioSessionMappings.description: Grants permission to list summary information about EMR Studio session mappings

ListStudios.name: ListStudios
ListStudios.description: Grants permission to list summary information about EMR Studios

ListSupportedInstanceTypes.name: ListSupportedInstanceTypes
ListSupportedInstanceTypes.description: Grants permission to list the Amazon EC2 instance types that an Amazon EMR release supports

ListWorkspaceAccessIdentities.name: ListWorkspaceAccessIdentities
ListWorkspaceAccessIdentities.description: Grants permission to list identities that are granted access to a workspace

ModifyCluster.name: ModifyCluster
ModifyCluster.description: Grants permission to change cluster settings such as number of steps that can be executed concurrently for a cluster

ModifyInstanceFleet.name: ModifyInstanceFleet
ModifyInstanceFleet.description: Grants permission to change the target On-Demand and target Spot capacities for a instance fleet

ModifyInstanceGroups.name: ModifyInstanceGroups
ModifyInstanceGroups.description: Grants permission to change the number and configuration of EC2 instances for an instance group

OpenEditorInConsole.name: OpenEditorInConsole
OpenEditorInConsole.description: Grants permission to launch the Jupyter notebook editor for an EMR notebook from within the console

PutAutoScalingPolicy.name: PutAutoScalingPolicy
PutAutoScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update an automatic scaling policy for a core instance group or task instance group

PutAutoTerminationPolicy.name: PutAutoTerminationPolicy
PutAutoTerminationPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

PutBlockPublicAccessConfiguration.name: PutBlockPublicAccessConfiguration
PutBlockPublicAccessConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create or update the EMR block public access configuration for the AWS account in the Region

PutManagedScalingPolicy.name: PutManagedScalingPolicy
PutManagedScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to create or update the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

PutWorkspaceAccess.name: PutWorkspaceAccess
PutWorkspaceAccess.description: Grants permission to allow an identity to open a collaborative workspace

RemoveAutoScalingPolicy.name: RemoveAutoScalingPolicy
RemoveAutoScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to remove an automatic scaling policy from an instance group

RemoveAutoTerminationPolicy.name: RemoveAutoTerminationPolicy
RemoveAutoTerminationPolicy.description: Grants permission to remove the auto-termination policy associated with a cluster

RemoveManagedScalingPolicy.name: RemoveManagedScalingPolicy
RemoveManagedScalingPolicy.description: Grants permission to remove the managed scaling policy associated with a cluster

RemoveTags.name: RemoveTags
RemoveTags.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon EMR resource

RunJobFlow.name: RunJobFlow
RunJobFlow.description: Grants permission to create and launch a cluster (job flow)

SetKeepJobFlowAliveWhenNoSteps.name: SetKeepJobFlowAliveWhenNoSteps
SetKeepJobFlowAliveWhenNoSteps.description: Grants permission to add and remove auto terminate after step execution for a cluster

SetTerminationProtection.name: SetTerminationProtection
SetTerminationProtection.description: Grants permission to add and remove termination protection for a cluster

SetUnhealthyNodeReplacement.name: SetUnhealthyNodeReplacement
SetUnhealthyNodeReplacement.description: Grants permission to enable or disable unhealthy node replacement for a cluster

SetVisibleToAllUsers.name: SetVisibleToAllUsers
SetVisibleToAllUsers.description: Grants permission to set whether all AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) users in the AWS account can view a cluster. This API is deprecated and your cluster may be visible to all users in your account. To restrict cluster access using an IAM policy, see AWS Identity and Access Management for Amazon EMR (https://docs.aws.amazon.com/emr/latest/ManagementGuide/emr-plan-access-iam.html)

StartEditor.name: StartEditor
StartEditor.description: Grants permission to start an EMR notebook

StartNotebookExecution.name: StartNotebookExecution
StartNotebookExecution.description: Grants permission to start an EMR notebook execution

StopEditor.name: StopEditor
StopEditor.description: Grants permission to shut down an EMR notebook

StopNotebookExecution.name: StopNotebookExecution
StopNotebookExecution.description: Grants permission to stop notebook execution

TerminateJobFlows.name: TerminateJobFlows
TerminateJobFlows.description: Grants permission to terminate a cluster (job flow)

UnlinkRepository.name: UnlinkRepository
UnlinkRepository.description: Grants permission to unlink an EMR notebook repository from EMR notebooks

UpdateEditor.name: UpdateEditor
UpdateEditor.description: Grants permission to update an EMR notebook

UpdateRepository.name: UpdateRepository
UpdateRepository.description: Grants permission to update an EMR notebook repository

UpdateStudio.name: UpdateStudio
UpdateStudio.description: Grants permission to update information about an EMR Studio

UpdateStudioSessionMapping.name: UpdateStudioSessionMapping
UpdateStudioSessionMapping.description: Grants permission to update an EMR Studio session mapping

ViewEventsFromAllClustersInConsole.name: ViewEventsFromAllClustersInConsole
ViewEventsFromAllClustersInConsole.description: Grants permission to use the EMR console to view events from all clusters
